commit message:
Merge pull request #1 from Kaljurand/gradle

Migrate building to Gradle

Make some activities MAIN/DEFAULT

This way the user can create desktop shortcuts
directly into these activities.
E.g. this simplifies access to the Settings.
Playback audio in DetailsActivity if getData!=null
Fix EXTRA_PROMPT not shown in some cases
Add example of launching KÃµnele using 'adb shell'
Store audio and make available to the caller

Add preliminary IME (uses kaldi-gstreamer-server)

The client of https://github.com/alumae/kaldi-gstreamer-server
is a slightly modified version of https://github.com/truongdq54/kaldi-gstreamer-android-client
